alert.note: Alert for Cook; Will (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 11:23PM CDT until July 28 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1145 PM CDT FOR WILL AND SOUTHEASTERN COOK COUNTIES... At 1123 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Evergreen Park to near Frankfort to near Limestone, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Joliet, Hammond, Orland Park, Tinley Park, Oak Lawn, Calumet City, Chicago Heights, Roseland, Lansing, Oak Forest, Harvey, Lockport, New Lenox, Homer Glen, Blue Island, Munster, Dolton, Park Forest, Homewood and Alsip. This includes... Windy City Thunderbolts Baseball, Hollywood Casino Amphitheatre, Governors State University, Moraine Valley Community College, Prairie State College, South Suburban College, and Will County Fairgrounds. Including the following interstates... I-55 between mile markers 235 and 240. I-57 between mile markers 325 and 355. I-80 between mile markers 136 and 155. I-94 between mile markers 66 and 74. I-294 between mile markers 66 and 74. I-355 between mile markers 1 and 11. Indiana I-90 between mile markers 1 and 2. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
